title: Create and Print Variable
description: Create a variable named 'age' with value 25, then print it.
instructions: Create a variable named 'age' with value 25, then print it.

hints.text: Use println() to print the variable

commonMistakes.mistake: Printing the variable name as a string
commonMistakes.correction: Print the variable without quotes: println(age)

commonMistakes.mistake: Using var when val would suffice

commonMistakes.correction: Variables must be initialized: val age = 25
